nodes.text: Fluffy was—allegedly—Vilmarh Grahrk's female pet stalking onsonker, to which he fed Bobo after he failed to produce the "Secret Treasure of the Jedi." Grahrk supposedly planted Fluffy's seeds inside Bobo so that the onsonker could hunt him down and devour him.

Because the species, individuals, and events described above are described only in The Devaronian Version, a story told by the notably untrustworthy Vilmarh Grahrk, their levels of accuracy are uncertain.
